blogPost.title:
SPACs have been very lucrative for the sponsor.

"The average SPAC sponsor return less concessions, forfeiture and vesting over the last two years was 648%."

From Michael Cembalest at JPM https://t.co/OxCgvYJeKX
blogPost.author: Michael Batnick

localize.full_text:
SPACs对赞助商来说是非常有利可图的。

"过去两年，SPAC保荐人的平均回报率减去让步、没收和归属，为648%。"

来自JPM的Michael Cembalest https://t.co/OxCgvYJeKX

SPACs對贊助商來說是非常有利可圖的。

"過去兩年，SPAC保薦人的平均回報率減去讓步、沒收和歸屬，爲648%。"

來自JPM的Michael Cembalest https://t.co/OxCgvYJeKX

previous.title:
When you’re swimming in a mania, you feel a little bit less like a maniac.

I wrote about my experience with NBA Top Shot

https://t.co/2GGXU6sPgF https://t.co/ZHJggGTfJt

localize.full_text:
当你游刃有余的时候，你会觉得自己有点不像个疯子。

我写了一篇关于《NBA巅峰对决》的心得体会

https://t.co/2GGXU6sPgF

當你遊刃有餘的時候，你會覺得自己有點不像個瘋子。

我寫了一篇關於《NBA巔峯對決》的心得體會

https://t.co/2GGXU6sPgF

next.excerpt:
Forget the balance sheets, the financials , the ceo, the board etc. Before I do
any of this, I tap the head office address of the company into Google and look
at it on streetview.

It might sound simple, but bear with me...

If you get chance to watch The China Hustle on Netflix, do it. It's about…
next.title: Google street view should be one of your first things to check when you think about investing in a stock.

localize.title: 当你考虑投资一只股票时，谷歌街景应该是你首先要检查的东西之一。
localize.the_new_excerpt:
忘掉资产负债表、财务状况、首席执行官、董事会等。在我做之前
任何这些，我在谷歌中点击公司的总部地址，并查看
在它的街景。

听起来很简单，但请听我说... ...

如果你有机会看Netflix上的《中国喧嚣》，就看吧。它是关于...

localize.title: 當你考慮投資一隻股票時，谷歌街景應該是你首先要檢查的東西之一。
localize.the_new_excerpt:
忘掉資產負債表、財務狀況、首席執行官、董事會等。在我做之前
任何這些，我在谷歌中點擊公司的總部地址，並查看
在它的街景。

聽起來很簡單，但請聽我說... ...
